meaningMnemonic:
You know 事 means "occurrence," but it can also mean "matter." And someone who handles <kanji>punish</kanji>ment <kanji>matter</kanji>s is someone like a <vocabulary>police detective</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>detective</vocabulary>) trying to find and punish the bad guys.

刑事 isn't an official job title but a common way to refer to a police officer whose job is to investigate crimes and arrest criminals. Depending on the context, it can also refer to matters that fall under criminal law, like 刑事事件 (criminal case).
